detail_desc: Bustier in a sturdy, fine-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a knot detail at the front.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with flounces around the armholes, short, narrow shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a wide skirt with gathers at the top. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft, embroidered cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Short shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulder seams, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a tapered waist with pleats, and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted top in sturdy, stretch fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with a small metal ring at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
Jersey joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs.
Socks in a rib-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Long dress in an airy crêpe weave in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Opening with inset lace at the front, an open back with lace sections and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Long metal earrings with plastic beads covered in matt fabric. Length 10.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Short, lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a brushed finish, zip down the front and gathers on the sleeves and at the back. Front pockets, one zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Straight-cut coat in soft imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners.

Top in jersey crêpe with a gently rounded neckline that has covered elastication at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim over the shoulders and elasticated hems. Gathered tiers for added volume.
Top in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wide, double-layered hairband in soft cotton jersey.
Vest top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with deep armholes.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Long, raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Loose fit.
Yoga socks with crossover elastic straps at the top and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy cotton weave with hole embroidery, a deep V-neck and ties with tassels at the ends.
Jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases and contrasting colour side stripes.
Tops in jersey with narrow shoulder straps. One with an all-over print.

Lightweight jacket in woven fabric with jersey sections front, back and on the sleeves and a mesh-lined hood. Ventilating mesh sections at the sides and underside of the sleeves, zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Partly lined in fleece.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft jersey with a motif and an elasticated waist.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and short cap sleeves.

Short dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace details, an opening at the back with crossover lacing and a concealed zip in one side. Long sleeves with a small opening and ties at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a scalloped lace trim at the hem. Partly lined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved tops in cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder, a chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in a patterned weave with a sewn-in wrapover with decorative buttons at the front and a zip at the back. Lined.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Calf-length wrap dress in chiffon crêpe with short butterfly sleeves and a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Seam and narrow ties at the waist, and a pleated skirt. Lined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Metal eyelets at each side and a sweatband.

Long, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey. Round neckline and an opening with a decorative bar-shaped metal bead at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a raw-edge hem.
Top in a cotton weave with tie-top shoulder straps and wide, frill-trimmed smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a flared peplum.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Joggers in velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Narrow belt in braided imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.
Metal earrings with an oblong pendant decorated with plastic stones. Length 5 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Short slits in the sides and slightly longer at the back.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Fitted top in soft, patterned modal jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Hooded jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece made partly from recycled polyester. Zip down the front with a chin guard and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Top in printed, slub-textured sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cargo trousers in crisp cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, and front, back and leg pockets, all with a flap and button. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.

Short wrap dress in soft, patterned satin with short, wide sleeves, and a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Buttons at the sides, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on top.
Cap in cotton twill with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back (size 6 months to 2Y with elastication).
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, narrow straps and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Shaping briefs in jersey and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The briefs have a gentle sculpting effect on the waist.
Straight, slightly shorter jumper in a fine-knit wool blend. Wide puff sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fine-knit shaftless yoga socks with elasticated tops and anti-slip protectors.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, elasticated waist and high cut at the back.

Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jacquard-weave skirt with a concealed zip in one side.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
